General.Name: Sunfar Computer Co Ltd
General.Description: Sunfar Computer Co., Ltd sells various goods for consumers in Taiwan. It offers home appliances, personal computer hardware and peripheral equipment, computer supplies and consumables, computer software and books, consumer electronics and communications, etc., as well as OA merchandise and maintenance services. The company provides its products through 62 stores and online shopping platform. Sunfar Computer Co., Ltd was founded in 1982 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
